revised_title: Periodical Laws in Magnetic Disturbances: A Study of Inclination and Total Force
tldr: The author investigates the mean effects of larger magnetic disturbances on the magnetic elements of inclination and total force. He finds that these disturbances follow periodical laws, similar to those previously discovered in magnetic declination, with periods of 1 solar day, 1 solar year, and approximately 10 solar years, corresponding to the Schwabe cycle of solar spots.
